input.sentences: we watched the giant parade go down the street .
there was so many costumes we saw .
some people were dressed up like the communist military .

output.sentences: The people gathered around to watch the street parade.
The people in the parade were dressed up in interesting costumes.
The parade looks like it is from another country.
The performers were dressed in red jackets.
